Title: Authorizes the town of North Hempstead to issue bonds or notes to finance certain liabilities of the length of service award programs of fire companies located within the town
Summary: Authorizes the town of North Hempstead to issue bonds or notes to finance certain liabilities of the length of service award programs of fire companies located within the town; provides fire protection to residents of the town.
LawCode: Amd ยง11.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to authorizing the town of North Hempstead to issue bonds or notes to finance certain liabilities of the length of service award programs of fire companies located within the town and providing fire protection to residents of the town
